step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder movement is generally good, but try to bring your shoulders back and down a bit more smoothly. Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together.
You're doing a great job with the circular motion. Remember to keep your elbows relaxed and let your shoulders lead the movement. Try to keep your wrists more neutral.
Excellent! You're completing the repetitions well. Continue to focus on the smooth, circular motion and the tip about breathing deeply as you pull your shoulders back.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Keep up the smooth, circular movements and remember to squeeze your shoulder blades back and down. Breathing deeply as you do this will help even more.
